message.body: Hawks making moves
Welker contract is unreal...can't believe the Pats let him walk for that little.
Amendola gets a 5-year deal with Pats...oh boy
What Hawks do? Been avoiding internets until I finish game.
Signed Cliff Avril
Color me surprised
Chris Clemons clone?
Interesting stat: Danny Amendola 2012 (age 27): 63/666/3tds Wes Welker 2006 (age 25--last with Dolphins): 67/687/1td Welker 2007 (first with Pats): 112/1175/8tds

Don't disagree amendola will be productive. Serious health issues in a team who's Window is closing. Also don't understand "not high on welker" all he has done is produce. If 120 catches and 1200-1500 yards consistently doesn't earn you high marks I don't know kw what does.

100% agree with you. I think Welker is good. I think the pats should've kept him at that price. My only point is that I think other players can be successful in Welker's role and replace (or come close) his production
Nice contract for Hawks on Avril
Does that point seem crazy?
Not completely. But 120/1500 is serious production
Totally -- could be 100% wrong for sure
Percy Harvin could do it
No doubt
Cliff avril could do it
Deon Butler could do it
Yep
Another nice -- low risk move for the hawks
I was just about to text you. Love it. Low risk exactly.
About to watch cuse
I like your offseason a lot. One big move. Other adding pieces.
Barwin deal...I was really nervous, but only 8 guaranteed
Didn't see you guys got him. Just got back from dinner.
I like it. He is a solid piece. You need just solid pieces first you know
